conversation.ai_prompt: Hi there, I'm Jake, a Software Engineer at TechCorp. How are you enjoying the event so far?
conversation.user_response: Hi Jake, nice to meet you. I'm finding the event pretty informative. How about you? Have you been to many of these?

conversation.ai_prompt: Yeah, I've been to a few. It's always great to see the latest trends in AI. What brings you to this event?
conversation.user_response: I'm really interested in AI as well, so I came to learn more about it and meet people in the industry. Are you working on any exciting AI projects right now?

conversation.ai_prompt: Absolutely, I'm currently involved in developing AI systems for healthcare at TechCorp. It's a fascinating area. Are you on LinkedIn? Maybe we can connect there.
conversation.user_response: Yes, I am on LinkedIn. I'd love to connect with you and learn more about your projects. I'll send you a request if that's okay.

conversation.ai_prompt: That sounds great. I should probably mingle a bit more, but it was nice chatting. Anything else you'd like to know before I move on?
conversation.user_response: I think that's it for now. It was great to hear about your work. I'll definitely follow up on LinkedIn.

conversation.ai_prompt: Thanks for the conversation. Enjoy the rest of the event!
conversation.user_response: Thanks, Jake. You too. Have a good one!
